author: mrmitch
title: Max and Tina are 2" big not the typical 1 1/2" tall
review: Good brick selection, some unusually pieces come in handy when creative freestyle take over. Some of the pieces are almost Duplo sized due to the height of the two mini figs included. Still a tub worth having in any Lego collection.

author: Exo_brick
title: Oh the joy!
review:
I remember getting this from my grandma and building this little robot dude. I loved this set and used it as my lego storage bin for a while. I want those times back. This set was very good for a five year old and a seven year old. On to the Pros and Cons! 

 Pros:
-great amount of parts
-comes with some very cool pieces
-two minifigs for two children.

 Cons:
-doors, but not enough parts to make anything more than a shed
some parts are useless.
